title: How to Make a Greek Country Bean Salad

steps.headline: Combine the lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
steps.description: Slowly pour the olive oil into the bowl as you stir the ingredients together.

steps.headline: Be sure to have all ingredients chopped or prepared before moving on since preparation is the most tedious part of the recipe.
Add the garlic, parsley, green peppers, cucumber, tomatoes, mint, black olives, beans, spring onions, and feta cheese in your salad or serving bowl.
Drizzle your lemon/olive oil based salad dressing over the serving bowl.
Serve each dish with a good amount of salad and touch it up with a sprig of parsley.

text: Combine the lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Slowly pour the olive oil into the bowl as you stir the ingredients together. Be sure to have all ingredients chopped or prepared before moving on since preparation is the most tedious part of the recipe.  Add the garlic, parsley, green peppers, cucumber, tomatoes, mint, black olives, beans, spring onions, and feta cheese in your salad or serving bowl.  Drizzle your lemon/olive oil based salad dressing over the serving bowl. Mix everything thoroughly. Serve each dish with a good amount of salad and touch it up with a sprig of parsley.
